skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in Araby, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Skilled at keeping the wheels on the caravan, even in the middle of nowhere.

effects.description: Cost of Caravan Shortcut event: -30%
Chance of a double move: +5%
Cost of Caravan Shortcut event: -50%
Chance of a double move: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Keep the contraband hidden from roadmarshals and customs agents.

effects.description: Maximum Caravan cargo capacity: +20%
Cargo charge in extortion events: -25%
Maximum Caravan cargo capacity: +30%
Cargo charge in extortion events: -50%

skillTree.localised_description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Even from within their vessels the Djinn will protect their masters.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the elemental spirits, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Warriors of great armies are decorated in ornate armour taken from the Sultan's personal armory, even the slaves!

skillTree.localised_description: Always use the local guides. They know more about this land than you ever will.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Running this caravan is the most contact his tribe has had with the world in years.

This Lord's caravan army has additional Nomad units

Missile strength: +6%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Of the Tuareg tribe. Their typical fight-for-coin lifestyle doesn't suit him, so he's taken to trading. There's still a lot of fighting though.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has additional Nomad units

Speed: +10%
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Born and raised in Ras Karim, he spent his early days walking up and down the Street of the Scholars. Some of that ingenuity must have rubbed off on him.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has additional Artillery units
Research rate: +10

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A secretive history allows him to call upon veteran troops who perhaps served him in the past.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has an additional Hashishin

Character experience per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This man has dedicated his life to the Djinn and follows the teachings of the Cult to the letter.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army includes Dervishers units

Corruption: -1
	(all provinces)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In Araby, reputation is a powerful tool, and those favoured by sultans and emirs will be able to recruit quality troops.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has units of increased quality

Physical resistance: 2%
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once of the Sultan's artillery legions. Though now an independent trader, those ties are hard to break.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has additional Artillery units

Ammunition: +20%
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Many masters of the continent spanning caravans come from the peasant oases or the slums of the Araby's mighty cities.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army has additional basic units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Now did I buy the powder from the Dwarfs or the Cathayans? Ah well, it probably doesn't matter.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Crack open a few kegs of Tialva or Arag and you've got some friends for life.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army includes Ogre Mercenary units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The caravan and its master spends a lot of time in the Land of Chivalry, to the point that he prefers the company of foreigners to his homeland.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Reduce line of sight
This Lord's caravan army includes Bretonnia units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A band of corsairs and their captain, turned to a life of honest work? Sure, if you ignore string of unsolved burglaries they leave in their wake.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: According to the Kitab al-Filaha al-Martekiyya, nasty weather can be predicted and avoided by careful observation of wind movements, the lunar phases, and planetary astral alterations.
